doc.after: Like most airlines before deregulation Piedmont did not have hubs The airline flew jets to small airports and connected unlikely city pairs with jet flights Kinston North Carolina and Florence South Carolina Roanoke Virginia and Asheville North Carolina Lynchburg Virginia and New York City s LaGuardia Airport Chicago s O Hare International Airport and Bristol Kingsport Johnson City Tennessee and Winston Salem North Carolina to Lynchburg Virginia
